amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce spending in the bill by $20,050,000,000 in order to reflect FY2008 levels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part A of House Report 111-219 to reduce spending in the bill by $20,050,000,000 in order to reflect FY2008 levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jordan (OH) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 287 (Roll no. 624).
